preparation_tips.html_content:
As the GLS DAT exam is approaching, candidates can look for various exam preparation tips to crack the GLS DAT 2025 exam. Below are some quick last-minute preparation tips that candidates can follow;

  • Focus on the syllabus: The GLS DAT syllabus is not specified by the GLS Institute of Design. However, the exam aims to assess a candidate's design ability. Questions asked will be based on Theme & Colour Inter-relationship, Mood, Colour Terminology, Colour, Pattern & Texture, Inspiration & Design Development, Colour Psychology & Optical Illusions, Elements & Principles of Design, etc.
  • Work on time management skills: As the GLS DAT entrance exam will be conducted both online and offline, candidates should manage their time according to their chosen mode. Candidates should have a proper strategy to attempt the GLS DAT 2025 question paper within the given time frame. If a candidate has opted for offline mode, he/ she should reach the examination center half an hour before the examination time. Do not forget to carry your GLS DAT 2025 admit card and photo ID.
  • Give more time to revise: Candidates are advised to revise the GLS DAT 2025 syllabus from their notes and preparation books. Do not prepare new topics at this time as it will be time-consuming as you will have to read large volumes of text which will eat up a lot of your editing time.
  • Practice more: As the GLS DAT 2025 entrance exam will have many questions on design-related topics, practice more such questions as it will sharpen your drawing and coloring skills.

 Before applying for NMIMS DAT 2025, candidates are advised to refer to the eligibility criteria as released by the concerned authorities. NMIMS DAT entrance exam for admission to the B.Des programme are conducted in the form of a Studio Test, followed  by Personal Interview, and submission of a Portfolio. The NMIMS DAT 2025 entrance exam for Phase 1 is expected to be held in May.

The NMIMS will issue the call letters for the NMIMS studio test, personal interview, and portfolio for registered applicants. NMIMS DAT call letters include date and time and other related instructions.

Based on the aspirant’s performance the NMIMS DAT first merit list is prepared. To download the NMIMS DAT first merit list candidates should enter the login credentials on its dashboard. Selected candidates have to upload the documents and pay the admission fee as per the schedule. 

The NMIMS DAT 2025 merit list will have names of selected candidates for NMIMS admission will be announced on the official website - nmims.edu.  Candidates who qualify on the merit list will have to pay an admission fee before the deadline.

about_exam.heading: About
about_exam.description:
WDT entrance exam 2024: Woxsen University released the WDT 2024 application form for round 3 for the B.Des programme on its official website at woxsen.edu.in. The last date for the Woxsen Design Test 2024 application form isApril 20. Candidates need to fill and submit the  WDT 2024 application form before the deadline. The authorities concluded the first and second round of Woxsen Design Test 2024 (WDT ) on December 16, 2023 and March 24 respectively. 

Earlier, the authorities started the registration process for the Woxsen Design Test 2024 from October 16, 2023. Candidates need to submit the WDT 2024 application form by December 15, 2023 along with SOP statement.  Candidates can also apply for BDes admission at Woxsen University using their NID/NIFT/UCEED/SAT scores. 

Interested candidates can apply for the Woxsen Design Test (WDT) by paying an online application fee of Rs. 1000. WDT 2024 eligibility criteria include successful completion of 10+2 or equivalent from a recognized board with a minimum aggregate score of 60%. Candidates appearing for 12th exam can also apply. However, aspirants should have passed class 12th or equivalent examination during admission to secure a seat at Woxsen University. The authorities will send the Woxsen WDT admit card to the student registered mail. Stay informed about the Woxsen Design Test 2024 dates to plan your preparation accordingly. To prepare for the Woxsen Design Test 2024 syllabus, candidates need to solve the Woxsen design test sample papers for better understanding of WDT exam pattern.

Candidates who wish to secure a seat in the B.Des (Hons) program at Woxsen University need to submit an application form along with a Statement of Purpose (SOP) detailing their motivation to pursue the B.Des course, achievements, and future goals. Candidates must take the Woxsen Design Test which evaluates their skills and knowledge. Candidates who successfully cleared the WDT are invited to take a psychometric test after then invited to a Personal interview.

What is the WDT entrance exam?

Woxsen Design Test (WDT) is a design entrance exam conducted by Woxsen University to shortlist the candidates for B.Des ( Hons) admission. The authorities have released the WDT notification on its official website. Candidates should be aware of the Woxsen Design Test 2024 deadline to ensure their application is submitted on time. However, Woxsen WDT entrance exam 2024 will be held on December 16, 2023. 

Woxsen University admissions are wholly based on the candidate's performance in the WDT entrance examination, Psychometric Test, and Personal Interview for admission to the B.Des programme. The Woxsen Design test takes place at designated exam centres, which will be shared with the applicants only. The authorities will release the Woxsen design test 2024 results in the form of offer letter. 

Woxsen B.Des Specialisations

Woxsen University offers various B.Des (Hons) specializations as mentioned below. Each specialization demands a unique skill set, which the university seeks in its candidates. 

Programme

Specialisations

B.Des (Hons)

Fashion Design

Interior Design

Industrial Design

Communication  Design

eligibility_criteria.html_content:
To be eligible for the Bachelor of Design( B.Des) programme at Woxsen University need to satisfy the following eligibilities:

  • Candidates must have successfully completed their 10 + 2 level of education or its equivalents from recognised boards such as CBSE, ISC, state Boards, IB, Cambridge, or other government recognised boards, with a minimum aggregate score of 60% .

  •  Proficiency in English is also a mandatory requirement. 

  • Students who are currently in their 12th Grade or equivalent can also apply.

  • Passing the 12th Grade or equivalent examination is mandatory for securing admission at Woxsen University. 

WDT Eligibility Criteria for International Students

Woxsen University opens applications for International students under following Categories: 

  • Foreign Nationals (FN): This category is for individuals who hold citizenship of a foreign country (excluding India) and do not possess CWG/PIO/OCI status.

  • Non-Resident Indians (NRI): This category is for individuals who, despite being Indian citizens, reside in a foreign country.

  • Persons of Indian Origin (PIO)/Overseas Citizenship of India (OCI): This category is for individuals who hold citizenship of any country (except Pakistan & Bangladesh) and possess a PIO/OCI card in accordance with the existing laws of the Indian Government.

Students who fall in the above categories will be considered International students for Woxsen University. The International students should satisfy the following Woxsen design test 2024 eligibility criteria mentioned by Woxsen University.

  • Applicants should have completed either Grade 10th/O level/Form IV/Secondary School equivalent to the Indian 10th or 12th grade examination, outside India.

  • Furthermore, candidates should have successfully completed Grade 12th/10+2/A level/Form VI/Higher Secondary School in any discipline from a recognized board, securing a minimum aggregate of 60%.

  • Candidates need to satisfy the below English language requirements mentioned by the University.

English Language Requirements

All International Students who are applying for B.Des (Hons) programme must meet the one of the following English language requirements: 

  • Candidates achieved a minimum of 60% marks in an English course in 10th/12th grade or Higher Education as stated above.

  • Completed their eligibility qualification at a School/University where English is the language of instruction. Proof of this must be provided by the respective School/University.

  • Attained an IELTS band score of 6.0.

  • Secured a TOEFL (ICBT) score of 70 or equivalent in any of the TOEFL formats.

Note: The equivalency of the educational qualifications will be determined by the Association of Indian Universities (AIU). If a qualification is not recognized by the AIU, the applicant must provide proof of equivalency from the Indian High Commission/Consulate in their respective country or the relevant statutory body, as applicable.

exam_name: NID DAT MDes - NID Design Aptitude Test for MDes

about_exam.heading: About
about_exam.description:
The National Institute of Design offers MDes programmes in design with various disciplines. NID conducts the design aptitude test, in short known as NID DAT to provide admission into its postgraduate programmes. NID MDes admissions are granted to the aspirants based on the NID DAT scores. The NID released the NID DAT 2025 MDes application form dates at the official website - admissions.nid.edu.

The NID DAT MDes exam 2025 registrations started on September 3, 2024. The applicants interested in pursuing the NID design programmes need to apply online before the NID DAT application form last date. Candidates need to fill and submit the NID DAT application form 2025 before December 3. The NID DAT MDes exam 2025 (Prelims) will be held on January 5.  

NID DAT entrance exam 2025 will be conducted in two stages known as the Design Aptitude test prelims and Design Aptitude test mains. NID DAT exam date 2025 has been released online at admissions.nid.edu for the mains. The applicants need to check and meet the NID DAT eligibility criteria 2025 before proceeding to fill the NID DAT application form. 

Latest News and Updates of NID DAT MDes Exam 2025 

NID released the MDes notification 2025 on its official website -  admissions.nid.edu. The NID DAT 2025 notification was released on September 3, 2024. The NID authorities have announced the NID 2025 application form dates. The candidates need to register and submit before the NID DAT 2025 application form last date. NID DAT MDes exam prelims will be conducted on January 5, 2025.

NID offers a MDes programme in Master of Design (MDes) for 2.5 years duration at Ahmedabad, Bengaluru and Gandhinagar. The aspirants who qualify the NID DAT prelims exam will be eligible for the NID DAT mains exam. For the NID DAT MDes entrance exam 2025, the candidates who register successfully will be able to download the NID DAT admit card. The shortlisted candidates from the NID DAT mains exam will be eligible for further selection rounds. The authorities will release the schedule for NID DAT 2025 counselling for which the candidates need to register online. The NID seat allotment will be based on the seat availability at various campuses.

About NID DAT Entrance Exam

The NID Design Aptitude Test (DAT) exam is a national-level exam conducted by the National Institute of Design. NID conducts entrance exams for the aspirants to provide admission to the MDes programmes in various disciplines. MDesign is offered for a period of 2.5 years. NID DAT MDes exam 2025 will be conducted in English language. The students will be offered admission based on the scores of NID DAT MDes exam scores.

eligibility_criteria.html_content:
The aspirants planning to take admission to the design MDes course need to fulfill the NID DAT MDes exam eligibility criteria 2025. The authorities of NID released the NID DAT MDes exam 2025 eligibility criteria for MDes programme through the official website - admissions.nid.edu. The NID DAT MDes eligibility criteria will specify the age requirements and the academic qualification required. Candidates can refer to the NID DAT MDes eligibility criteria 2025 for MDes provided as follows.

NID DAT eligibility criteria for M.Des

As the NID DAT MDes exam eligibility criteria 2025 has been released. Candidates can check the NID DAT eligibility criteria which is as follows.

Age limit

  • Candidates belonging to the general and general EWS category born on or after July 1,  1993 are eligible to apply for the exam. 

  • Reserved category candidates such as OBC-NCL, SC, ST should be born on or after July 1, 1990. 

  • The PwD category candidates should have been born on or after July 1, 1988.

Educational qualifications

  • Candidates to have a bachelor's degree of minimum 4 years in any specialisation, after 12th standard from a recognised institute or university.                                                     (Note: Candidates must have appeared for all subjects and backlogs, if any, by June 28, 2025)

(or)

  • Candidates must have a full time diploma of 4 years duration in design/fine arts/applied arts/architecture, after completing class 12, from any recognised university or institute. (Note: Candidates must have appeared for all subjects and backlogs, if any, by June 28, 2025)

(or)

  • Applicants must have completed 3 years bachelor degree in any specialisation from a recognised board or university.

  • Students who will be appearing in the final year of the bachelors degree exam or full time diploma programme and may have not received the final degree certificate are also eligible. However, the selected candidates should produce their result certificate before the specified date given by the authorities.

  • (Note: Candidates must have passed the bachelor degree by August 2024)

preparation_tips.html_content:
Before planning to appear for the NID DAT MDes exam 2025, the candidates should follow some useful preparation tips. These preparation tips help the candidates to know some practical tips to crack the NID DAT 2025 MDes exam. Careers360 gives the best tips for the candidates on how to crack NID DAT MDes entrance exam and obtain admission into the NID campuses.

  • Solving previous year’s NID DAT sample papers is one of the best ways to begin the preparation for the NID DAT MDes exam. This gives an idea of the questions and its format that will be asked in the entrance exam. The aspirants will also be able to know about the marking scheme of the exam.
  • Practising NID DAT mock exams helps the candidates to understand the difficulty levels of the exam.
  • Going through to resolve the previous year's NID DAT MDes question paper helps to prepare for the entrance exam.
  • Candidates should prepare a plan accordingly to practise the previous year NID DAT MDes exam sample paper.
  • The students should also read the best books for NID DAT MDes exam preparation. Some of the best books are the NID DAT book by RS Aggarwal, Design Drawing by Francis D.K. Singh, Robert W.Gill's basic rendering, and NID mock test series.

admit_card.html_content:

The schedule of dates to download the NID DAT 2025 admit card of MDes exam is available on the official website - admissions.nid.edu. The NID DAT Prelims admit card 2025 for MDes will be released on December 24, 2024 and for mains exam on February 24, 2025.

Candidates need to use their allotted login credentials to download the NID DAT MDes exam admit card 2025. The NID DAT MDes 2025 admit card contains details such as the name of the candidate, date of birth, application number, roll number, category, course name, exam centre code, name and address, reporting time and the signature of the candidate. 

It is mandatory for the candidates to carry the hard copy of the NID DAT MDes admit card to the examination centre on the day of entrance exam. Also, the candidates must bring any one of the valid photo identity proofs to the exam centre such as PAN card, aadhar card, driving licence, voter Id, and passport, etc along with the NID DAT MDes admit card 2025.

Steps to download the NID DAT 2025 MDes admit card

The aspirants can access and download the NID DAT MDes admit card 2025 by following the steps provided below. 

  • Visit the NID official website - admissions.nid.edu.
  • Click on the NID DAT admit card link on the home page.
  • Enter the login credentials in the login window and click submit.
  • The NID DAT MDes exam admit card appears on the screen.

  • Click on the download button for the NID DAT MDes admit card to be downloaded.

cutoffs.html_content:
The NID DAT cutoff 2025 for the MDes exam will be released at the official website - admissions.nid.edu. The NID DAT MDes cutoff 2025 will be released separately for the prelims and mains exam. The NID DAT 2025 cutoff is the minimum score required for candidates to qualify in the exams for further admission process.  The authorities will release the NID DAT MDes cutoff 2025 institute-wise.

The NID DAT MDes cutoff 2025 will be prepared based on the factors such as the total number of applications received, number of candidates appeared for the test, total number of seats available, and the difficulty levels of the NID DAT MDes exam 2025.

counselling_process.html_content:
The NID authorities will release the NID DAT counselling dates 2025 for the MDes candidates at the official website - admissions.nid.edu. The candidates who qualified in the NID DAT mains exam 2025 will be eligible to participate in the NID DAT counselling 2025. The shortlisted candidates need to register for NID MDes 2025 counselling process. Candidates need to follow the below steps to appear for NID DAT MDes counselling 2025.

  • The qualified candidates need to register for the NID DAT MDes counselling 2025 in online mode.
  • Also candidates need to provide their choice of campus preference.
  • The required documents have to be uploaded as per the dates schedule that will be released by the NID authorities for document verification.
  • Candidates will be issued with the provisional offer letter that will be based on the merit list, seat availability and the candidate’s category.
  • The NID DAT final merit list will be released according to the schedule on the official website.
  • Candidates selected will be offered NID MDes admission at the preferred campus.
  • Selected candidates need to confirm their seat allotment by making a payment of the prescribed amount as the NID admission fees.

The applicants are advised to check the NID DAT MDes 2025 exam pattern online at the official website. The NID DAT 2025 MDes exam pattern consists of the total number of questions, types of questions, mode and duration of the exam. NID DAT MDes exam pattern comprises two sections - Prelims and Mains. The shortlisted candidates from the NID DAT Prelims need to appear for NID DAT Mains exam. The total marks of NID DAT MDes exam is 100.

JD Institute of Fashion Technology will release the notification in January 2025 for its UG and PG programmes for the next academic year. The authorities will announce the GAT registration 2025 online. The JD Institute of Fashion Technology GAT application form 2025 will be made available at jdinstitute.ac.in. The aspirants will have to register for the entrance exam before the JD Institute of Fashion Technology GAT 2025 application form last date. Candidates willing to obtain seats in the design programme need to appear for the entrance exam known as General Aptitude Test (GAT).

The basic criteria to be checked first by the aspirants is eligibility. The applicants willing to obtain admission to the design courses at JD Institute of Fashion Technology have to meet the GAT exam eligibility criteria 2025. Applicants who meet the eligibility criteria can apply for the GAT 2025 by making the application fee payment online. The GAT entrance exam 2025 will be conducted in multiple cycles based on the seat availability in the UG, PG, and Diploma for UG & PG courses.

JD Institute of Fashion Technology Latest News and Updates

The authorities at JD Institute of Fashion Technology are expected to release the GAT 2025 application form in February on the official website -  jdinstitute.ac.in. The GAT 2025 entrance exam will be conducted in online mode by the authorities. The GAT entrance exam 2025 will be held in multiple cycles according to the availability of seats in the design programmes.

Only those candidates who complete the registration process before the deadline will be issued with the JD GAT admit card 2025. Aspirants have to visit the official website and login using the application number and password to download the JD GAT 2025 admit card.  Result for JD GAT 2025 will also be available at the official website.

To secure admission to the undergraduate and postgraduate courses, the candidates must appear for the GAT entrance exam conducted by JD Institute of Fashion Technology.

Online 

The candidates who qualify the JD GAT entrance exam 2025 will be shortlisted and forwarded to the next round called as Personal Interaction round. The marking scheme is divided into two parts of a ratio of 60:40, where Creative is assigned 60% and the interview is 40%.

The candidates appearing for the GAT entrance exam have to report before 30 minutes of the exam. The Creative (GAT) will be held for 1 hour 30 minutes and the personal interview for 30 minutes.

Note: The authorities will not provide any prescribed syllabus for GAT. Because the candidates are assessed based on their creativity skills and interpretation of a given topic using their imagination skills.

exam_name: UCEED - Undergraduate Common Entrance Examination for Design

about_exam.heading: About
about_exam.description:
UCEED Exam 2025: Indian Institute of Technology, Bombay released the UCEED exam notification 2025 on October 1, 2024. As the UCEED 2025 exam notification is released, candidates can check details related to the Undergraduate Common Entrance Exam for Design at uceed.iitb.ac.in 2025. The UCEED 2025 exam will be conducted on January 19. Moreover, the UCEED exam registrations started on October 1, 2024 at 1 PM. Candidates aspiring to pursue B.Des course at top IITs should fill the UCEED 2025 application form before the last date. 

Candidates who passed the class 12th or equivalent from any stream are eligible for taking the UCEED exam 2025. The UCEED 2025 eligibility includes three criteria mainly such as age limit, number of attempts, and academic qualifications.  Candidates who satisfy the eligibility criteria set by the exam conducting body can fill the UCEED application form. Candidates will be able to fill the UCEED registration 2025 by providing the necessary details and paying the requisite application fee.

UCEED exam 2025 Latest News and Updates

UCEED 2025 notification was released by IIT Bombay at the UCEED admission portal, on October 1. The authorities specified all the requirements and information in UCEED notification 2025. 

Aspirants who will complete the UCEED exam 2025 form filling process before the deadline will be issued with admit card. UCEED exam admit card 2025 will be made available at uceed.iitb.ac.in. Aspirants have to use their application number and password to download the admit card of UCEED 2025. 

Candidates appearing for the UCEED entrance exam will be able to download their scorecard from March 10, 2025 onwards. Note that only those candidates who qualify the entrance exam will be allowed to download UCEED scorecard 2025. Moreover, qualified candidates will have to participate in the UCEED counselling and seat allotment process. 

What is the UCEED 2025 exam ?  

UCEED exam is an entrance examination conducted by IIT Bombay that will be held on January 19, 2025. The UCEED exam is conducted for admission for Bachelors of Design (B.Des) programmes at IIT Bombay, IIT Roorkee,  IIT Delhi,  IIT Hyderabad, IIT Guwahati, IIT Roorkee and IIITDM Jabalpur. The UCEED exam assesses candidates' aptitude for design, visual perception ability, logical reasoning, creativity, and communication skills. It typically consists of NAT, MCQ, MSQ as well as subjective questions that test candidates' drawing and design skills. Candidates who qualify the UCEED exam 2025 can get the admission in the IITs. eligibility_criteria.html_content:
UCEED 2025 eligibility criteria released by IIT Bombay on its official website - uceed.iitb.ac.in. Students aspiring for admission need to fulfill the UCEED 2025 eligibility criteria the following criteria :

  • Candidates should qualify all subjects in 10 +2 or equivalent or any stream are  eligible for the UCEED exam. 

  • Candidates born on or after October 1, 2000, belong to the Open/EWS/OBC-NCL category 

  • Students born on or after October 1, 1995, belong to the SC, ST or PwD category.

  • Students need to clear the UCEED exam in 2 attempts only, that too consecutive years. 

Note: Candidates should note that the UCEED score card is valid for one year only.

application_process.html_content:
Candidates aiming for a seat at IITs for B.Des programme need to apply for the UCEED exam 2025. The exam conducting body released the UCEED application form 2025 on October 1, 2024 at its official website - uceed.iitb.ac.in. Candidates should submit the UCEED 2025 application form before the last date. The registration will be cancelled if the candidate does not meet the UCEED 2025 eligibility criteria. Candidates need to check all the eligibility requirements before applying for the UCEED exam date 2025. 

What are the documents required to fill the UCEED application form?

Candidates are required to keep the documents ready to fill the application form of UCEED 2025. All the documents provided will be verified by the authorities. In case of any false information or documents candidature will be cancelled. To complete the UCEED registration form, candidates need to upload the following documents listed below: 

  • A recent coloured photograph with specified size. 

  • A scanned copy of signature (only in jpeg format and jpg format).

  • Academic certificates (only in pdf formats)

  • Reserved category certificates (caste certificate in pdf format- if applicable)

  • Candidates under Dyslexic category need to submit FORM-DYSLEXIC 1 and 2 instead of PwD certificate.

preparation_tips.html_content:
The UCEED preparation tips are important for candidates to attain high scores in the exam. Candidates must refer to the best books or resources available in the market to prepare well. Candidates aspiring for design exam can follow the below mentioned points to crack the UCEED exam 2025: 

  • Prioritise the topics which are important and asked repeatedly in the exam. 

  • Understand the exam structure and UCEED exam 2025 syllabus and analyse the type of question asked, sections , topics need to be practised more. 

  • Candidates need to focus on strengthening their basics in each section.

  • Improve the drawing and sketching skills to score in the part B. 

  • Practice managing time by solving the UCEED sample papers and previous year question papers. 

  • Practise on the sections like MSQ and MCQ, which having the negative marking 

  • Don't leave questions from sections like NAT, where there is no negative marking.

admit_card.html_content:
IIT Bombay will issue the UCEED admit card 2025 online through its official website - uceed.iitb.ac.in. UCEED 2025 admit card date as per the official announcement is January 3. Candidates who will finish the UCEED registration form will be able to download the UCEED hall ticket. To access the UCEED 2025 hall ticket, candidates need to use their login credentials. Candidates aspiring to appear for UCEED exam need to carry the UCEED admit card to the exam centre. After downloading the UCEED admit card, candidates need to check the details mentioned on the hall ticket. 

Steps to download the UCEED Admit Card 2025

Candidates can check the following steps to download the UCEED admit card 2025. 

  • Go to the official website - uceed.iitb.ac.in. 

  • Check for the UCEED admit card’ link on the home page 

  • Enter the credentials  such as email ID and password.

  • The admit card of UCEED will be available on the screen

  • Candidates can check the details on the admit card and take print out for future use. 

Details Mentioned on UCEED Hall Ticket 

  The UCEED hall ticket contains the following details :

  • Name 

  • Registration number

  • Roll number

  • Date of birth

  • Signature

  • Test centre 

  •  Instructions for the exam day

cutoffs.html_content: Candidates who wish to qualify the UCEED exam to get admission to B.Des need to score the minimum marks. The UCEED cutoff is prepared based on several factors such as difficulty level of the exam, number of applicants, availability of seats, and past years cutoff trends. Candidates who are included in the UCEED rank list can participate in the UCEED counselling rounds and joint seat allotment process.

counselling_process.html_content:
UCEED counselling 2025 will be conducted in multiple rounds (approximately 5) till all the seats are filled. UCEED 2025 counselling involves various stages such as registration, choice filling, seat allocation and document verification. The UCEED counselling process aims to ensure a fair and transparent allocation of seats to candidates based on their merit and preferences. Here are the steps involves in the UCEED counselling process: 

  • Candidates who qualified the UCEED exam 2025 need to register for the counselling process through the official website. 

  • During the registration process, candidates need to provide the required details such as personal and academic details, and more.

  • After UCEED counselling registration, candidates are required to fill their choices of B.Des. programs and institutes in order of preference.

  • Based on the candidates' UCEED rank, category, and preferences, the counselling authority conducts the seat allotment process. Seats are allocated to candidates according to their rank and the availability of seats in their preferred programs and institutes.

  • Candidates who are allocated seats in the counselling process must indicate their acceptance of the allotted seat within the specified deadline. They are also required to pay the requisite admission fee to confirm their UCEED admission seat.

Exam_Pattern.html_content:
IIT Bombay published the UCEED exam pattern on its official admission portal. UCEED exam pattern 2025 is designed to assess the candidates aptitude and skills. The UCEED 2025 exam will consist of two parts: Part A and Part B. UCEED Part A  consists of three sections namely Numerical Answer Type (NAT), Multiple Select Questions (MSQ), and Multiple Choice Questions (MCQ). Part B consists of two questions on drawing skills and design aptitude.

faqs.question: What is the eligibility criteria for UCEED 2025?
faqs.answer: Candidates who have completed their 10+2 or equivalent exam from any stream are eligible to apply for UCEED.

faqs.question: What is the structure of the UCEED exam?
faqs.answer: The UCEED exam is divided into two parts: Part A is a computer-based test and Part B contains questions that test design and drawing skills. The total duration of the exam is 3 hours.

faqs.question: Is there any negative marking for UCEED exam 2025?
faqs.answer: Yes, there are few sections in UCEED part A which has negative marking.

faqs.question: How many attempts can I make for the UCEED exam ?
faqs.answer: Candidates can attempt the exam only 2 times, that too in 2 consecutive ways.

faqs.question: When is the UCEED 2025 application form expected to be released?
faqs.answer: The UCEED 2025 application form is available from October 1, 2024 onwards.

exam_name: DAIICT - DAIICT Design Aptitude Test
conducting_body: Dhirubhai Ambani Institute of Information and Communication Technology

about_exam.heading: About
about_exam.description:
Dhirubhai Ambani Institute of Information and Communication Technology released announce the DAIICT M.Des admission status of confirmed and waiting list on July 8, 2024. DAIICT M.Des 2024 admission status is avaialable on the official website - daiict.ac.in. or cbexams.com. Candidates can check their DAIICT 2024 M.Des admission status by entering the  login credentials such as DA IICT application number, date  of birth and course name. Shortlisted candidates can register and verify the documents at DAIICT campus on July 15. 

DA IICT merit list released by the authorities on its official website -daiict.ac.in. DA IICT merit list released on June 29, 2024. Shortlisted candidates are eligible to attend the DAIICT 2024 counselling by using the login credentials such as DA IICT application number, date  of birth and course name. Candidates need to pay the fees and confim the DAIICT M.Des seat by July 5, 2024.The authorities conducted DAIICT DAT entrance exam on June 16, 2024.

The authorities issued the DAIICT admit card on its official website - daiict.ac.in. DAIICT admit card 2024 date was June 13. Candidates could check to DAIICT hall ticket by using their login credential such as application number and date of birth. The authorities extended the DAIICT 2024 application form till May 31. The online application form for DAIICT 2024 admission was available on its official website -daiict.ac.in.  Interested candidates need to fill out and submit the DAIICT 2024 application form before the specified the date. DAIICT registration form 2024 began on March 14.  

Candidates who wish to pursue M.Des degree should have a valid CEED score or appear for Design Aptitude Test. Candidates with a valid CEED score will be selected for interview if they have qualified Part A, and have obtained a minimum of 25 marks in Part B. Final DAIICT admission 2024 will be done based on the combined scores attained in the DAT/CEED and the interview. The DAT will constitute 60%, and the interview 40% of the overall marks assigned to the admission test.

Interested candidates had to submit the online application along with the Statement of Purpose (SOP). Moreover, aspirants had to pay a non-refundable fee of Rs. 1200/- (Total: Rs. 1416/-). plus GST@ 18%. The authorities will call the list for interview on June 19, 2024. Interviews will be conducted on June 24 and June 25, 2024. 

Moreover, candidates should have 55% marks or equivalent in the last qualifying degree/examination and are required to submit the provisional Degree certificate or proof of completion of Degree before 30 October 2024 failing which their admission is liable to cancellation.

Registered candidates will be able to download their hall tickets for DAT 2024 from the official website. Aspirants have to use DAIICT application number and date of birth. 

Candidates can check their DAIICT exam results in online mode at daiict.ac.in. The result of DAIICT 2024 will be available in the form of a merit list. The authority will release the list of eligible candidates for the Personal Interview round for DAIICT 2024 MDes (CD) admission. The shortlisted candidates appeared for the interview as per the declared schedule. They will be communicated with the link for an online interview.

What is the DAIICT DAT Test?

Design Aptitude Tests consist of 3 parts, each bearing 20 marks.

Part 1: This test will evaluate the candidate’s drawing skills, imaginative visualization, and ability to interpret a problem.

Part 2: This will evaluate the student's recognition and understanding of a range of design idioms, visual/performative art forms, and practices from various social and cultural contexts.

Part 3: The students will be asked to write a subjective response to a Communication Design brief. 

NOTE: The students should secure a minimum of 40% in the DAT exam to be considered for the interview process.

conducting_body: Indian Institute of Art and Design

about_exam.heading: About
about_exam.description:
Indian Institute of Art & Design has released the Design Aptitude Test notification for admissions in August 2024. The IIAD application form 2025 is available at iiad.edu.in. DAT is the entrance exam conducted by IIAD for the admission of design courses. The IIAD DAT exam date 2025 will be announced shortly on the official website. The IIAD entrance exam will be held tentatively in June 2025.

The applicants must check the eligibility criteria before moving on to the application process. The basic IIAD eligibility criteria are the candidates must have passed 10+2 in any stream from a recognised university. However, the eligibility criteria 2025 will be updated accordingly in the schedule of the admission brochure. The application fee of Rs. 2500 has to be paid online during the application process. Hence the applicants are advised to visit the IIAD website regularly for the latest updates.

Candidates who will complete the registration before the deadline will be able to download the admit card. The admit card of IIAD DAT 2025 will include details like name, allotted exam centre, time, roll number, and exam day guideline.  The IIAD entrance exam will be conducted online. 

The results of the entrance exam will be communicated directly to the candidates. There will be a portfolio round for the candidates shortlisted after the entrance exam.

About IIAD 

The authorities at IIAD conduct the entrance exam to grant admissions to candidates who are very keen on their careers. The IIAD offers design programmmes at undergraduate and postgraduate levels. 

  • For the UG admissions, applicants must appear for the IIAD DAT entrance exam followed by a portfolio interview. Direct admissions are also provided based on the scores of other entrance examinations.

  • For the PG admissions, the candidates must appear for the IMAT entrance exam. The shortlisted candidates will be called for a personal interview. The selected candidates will be granted admission.

highlights.value: Indian Institute of Art and Design Entrance Exam
Indian Institute of Art and Design

eligibility_criteria.html_content:
The aspirants planning to be admitted to the IIAD design course must meet the eligibility criteria described below. The IIAD eligibility criteria 2025 is provided separately for undergraduate and postgraduate programmes.

Eligibility Criteria for Undergraduate Programme

  • Candidates with 10+2 or equivalent from any stream (Science, Commerce, Humanities/Arts) with 50% as minimum score. 

  • The students who are going to appear for class XII exam 

  • Also, those who are waiting for their class 12 results may apply. 

  • The students from CBSE/ISC/State/IB or any other equivalent Indian or International Higher Secondary Board are eligible.

Postgraduate Programme Eligibility Criteria

  • Graduates from any stream or discipline from a recognised institute/university.

  • Final-year graduate students are also eligible.

  • Candidates who are awaiting results may also apply.

application_process.html_content:
Indian Institute of Art & Design released the IIAD 2025 application form online in August 2024 at iiad.edu.in. The aspirants have to submit the IIAD application form 2025 before the deadline. While filling out the application form, the applicants have to pay Rs. 2500/- as the application fee online.

The applicants are advised to keep the following documents ready to carry out the application submission process smoothly. Ensure that the scanned copies of the documents are available.

  • Class 10 mark sheet

  • Class 12 mark sheet

  • Photo identity proof

  • Candidate photograph

  • Candidate’s signature  

  • Category certificate

  • Certificate of disability (if applicable)

Steps to fill out the IIAD 2025 application form

  • First, visit the official website of IIAD - iiad.edu.in.

  • Next, find and click on the “Apply” link. 

  • It will redirect you to another page. From there, choose the course for which you want to apply for.

  • Then, click on the link called “Click here to Apply”.

  • Fill out the IIAD 2025 registration form with valid details to generate the login credentials.

  • Next, log in to the dashboard using the login credentials and fill out the IIAD entrance exam 2025 application form.

  • Then, pay the application fee of Rs 2500 in online mode.

  • Finally, submit the complete application form and take a printout of it for your future use.

preparation_tips.html_content:
To pass the IIAD entrance exam, the students can check for these preparation tips. 

  • Find and analyze the exam pattern.

  • Note down the syllabus.

  • Compare the previous exam pattern to know the type of questions.

  • Practice more to create new designs

  • Check and be up-to-date on the latest trends.

  • Know the best books to read.

  • Try solving previous sample papers in a specified time.

  • Attempt mock tests if possible for you.

admit_card.html_content:
The IIAD admit card 2025 will be issued in online mode. The applicants are required to download the IIAD 2025 admit card. The students must carry the IIAD admit card 2025 to the exam centre. The candidates must also display an original photo Identity proof that will be validated by the examiner at the exam centre. The students need to carry valid photo identity proofs that may be a passport, a PAN card, or a voter ID.

How to download IIAD 2025 admit card?

  • Step 1: Log in to the registered mail id.

  • Step 2: Visit the received link from the Indian Institute of Art and Design.

  • Step 3: It will ask you to enter valid login credentials.

  • Step 4: After entering the required credentials, click on the “Submit” button.

  • Step 5: Finally, your appropriate IIAD 2025 hall ticket will be downloaded.

IIAD Hall Ticket 2025: Details Mentioned

On the IIAD admit card 2025, the candidates will be able to view the below details.

  • Student name

  • Roll number 

  • Application number 

  • Exam date

  • Exam time 

  • Course name

  • Exam centre details

  • Exam day instructions

Based on the sample papers received, the students may start preparation for the IIAD entrance exam. The total marks of the entrance exam are 100.  

The IIAD entrance exam is conducted for two days. The IIAD exam pattern is a combination of writing tasks, visual tasks, one-word answers, and multiple-choice questions.

  • Candidates will be given 3 hours to complete the entrance exam.
  • The UID entrance exam will include a written test, and the shortlisted candidates will have to take a Creative Situation Test along with a Personal Interview and Portfolio Round.    
  • In the situation test, the test-takers will be given different situations. They will be required to make models based on that. There will be questions requiring sketching as well.
  • For the personal interview, the shortlisted candidates will have to appear for a personal interview. They will have to carry their portfolios as well.

about_exam.heading: About
about_exam.description:
Army Institute of Fashion and Design will announce the AIFD WAT notification on its official website - aifd.edu.in.The authorities will release the AIFD WAT application form likely in February, 2025. Candidates interested in design programmes at AIFD can apply for the AIFD WAT 2025. Students are advised to check the AIFD WAT 2025 eligibility criteria prior to filling the application form of AIFD WAT. 

Aspirants who want to take AIFD WAT entrance exam need to meet the eligibility criteria specified by the authorities. AIFD admissions are given to the candidates who satisfy the eligibility requirements of AIFD. Applicants who are children of ex-army personnel, serving army personnel, children of war widow, widow of the army or other children of Ex Army Medical Corps Officers / Army Dental Corps Officers Presently Serving with Indian Navy or Indian Air Force (IN / IAF), and children of APS / MNS / TA Personnel are eligible to apply for AIFD admission. 

Applicants who will fill the AIFD WAT registration form 2025 completely will be able to access the admit card. The authorities will release the AIFD WAT admit card likely in  the last week of March, 2025. Candidates need to check the details mentioned on the AIFD WAT 2025 admit card after downloading it. Candidates need to bring the AIFD WAT hall ticket to the exam centre along with some valid identity proof. 

AIFD WAT 2025 Latest News and Updates

AIFD WAT notification 2025 will be released by the AIFD authorities on its official website - aifd.edu.in. The AIFD WAT 2025 notification includes eligibility criteria, application form, admission details, exam pattern and many instructions. 

Army Institute of Fashion and Design will declare the AIFD WAT result tentatively in April, 2025. Candidates who appeared the AIFD WAT exam can check their AIFD WAT result 2025 on its official website - aifd.edu.in. shortlisted candidates need to pay the AIFD WAT admission fee before the specified date. After the payment is made by the selected candidates the merit list will be released by the authorities. AIFD WAT merit list will be released in May 2025, tentatively. 

About AIFD WAT Exam 

Army Institute of Fashion and Design will conduct the AIFD WAT exam for design admission offered by the institute. THe AIFD WAT exam assesses the candidate aptitude and skills in areas such as intelligence and reasoning test, general awareness test, and english language competency & comprehension test. AIFD 2025 exam evaluates the candidates by written test i.e, WAT. Candidates who qualified can gain admission at AIFD for B.Sc. (FAD) and B.Sc. (IDD) courses.

eligibility_criteria.html_content:
Applicants who seek AIFD admission are suggested that they need to meet the eligibility criteria. The authorities will publish the AIFT eligibility criteria on its official brochure. Candidates need to go through all the instructions and eligibility criteria specified on its AIFD 2025 notification before applying for the exam. Candidates can view the AIFD WAT eligibility criteria 2025 from the table below: 

  • Applicants need to be children of serving Army personnel/ ex Army personnel and children of war widows/widows of the Army. 

  • Candidates must satisfy any one of the following category:

    • Children of serving army personnel (minimum 10 year serve period is required)

    •  Children of ex-Army personnel

    • Adopted/ step Children and children of remarried woman

    • Children of Ex Army Medical Corps Officers / Army Dental Corps Officers Presently Serving with Indian Navy or Indian Air Force (IN / IAF)

    • Children of APS / MNS / TA Personnel. 

  • Candidates must pass class 11 and 12 standard with 35% minimum aggregate marks from a  recognised body/ University. 

  • Candidates completed 10+2 in regular mode are eligible for admission to B.Sc. (FAD) and B.Sc. (IDD) as per Bengaluru North University norms. 

  • Applicants who completed 10+2 via distance education or NIOS must have the same subjects in both 11th and 12th grades, admission is through the Online Admission Test (OAT).

application_process.html_content:

Candidates who failed to meet the eligibility criteria mentioned on the AIFD WAT official notification then candidature will be cancelled. To complete the AIFD WAT application form 2025 candidates need to pay the application fee specified by the authorities. 

Documents need to be uploaded with AIFD application form 2025

  • X/SSC/ICSE Certificate

  • XI Certificate

  • XII Certificate: If passed in the previous year, or mention appearing.

  • Caste Certificate: If SC/ST/OBC.

  • Gallantry Awards: Details and attach Gazette Notification if applicable.

Steps to apply for AIFD WAT 2025 registration form

The steps to fill out the AIFD WAT application form were as follows:

Registration - Aspirants have to first complete the AIFD WAT 2025 registration process by providing some basic details such as name, email id, mobile number etc.

Fill out the application form - Next, upon successful registration, the login credentials are generated. Aspirants have to login using the credentials and completed filling out the application form.

Upload the documents - Aspirants also have to upload the necessary documents as per specifications provided by the concerned authorities.

Pay the application fee - Finally, aspirants made the payment of the application fee of AIFD WAT 2025.

preparation_tips.html_content:
Students preparing for AIFD WAT exam 2025, need to go through the following preparation tips to excel in the exam. 

  • Start creating the study plan with a preparation schedule and allocate time for each topic, section, and take short breaks to avoid exhaustion.

  • To avoid unnecessary stress, start the early preparation before the exam. 

  • Study the entire syllabus to avoid missing any topics. 

  • Study regularly using the AIFD WAT entrance exam books, study materials, sample papers and previous year question papers.

  • Take a mock test to experience the actual exam.

  • Regularly practising helps the students to identify their strengths and weaknesses.  

  • Improve the sketching and drawing skills for design related skills.

conducting_body: State Common Entrance Test Cell - Maharashtra State

about_exam.heading: About
about_exam.description:
The Maharashtra State Common Entrance Test (CET) cell will announce the MAH BDes registration 2025 dates at mahacet.cetcell.org. The MAH BDes application form 2025 is expected to be released in January 2025. The students willing to pursue design courses will be able to fill out the MAH BDes application form 2025 in online mode. 

The MAH BDes entrance exam will be conducted in two parts, i.e. Part - A and Part - B. The MAH BDes entrance exam will be held in April 2025, tentatively. The MAH BDes exam dates 2025 will be announced at mahacet.cetcell.org.

The applicants have to check the MAH BDes eligibility criteria 2025 before applying. It is a must for the aspirants to meet the MAH BDes 2025 eligibility criteria before proceeding with the application process. Candidates who register and submit the MAH BDes application form 2025 successfully will be able to download the admit card or hall ticket for the entrance exam.
Also Read: Top Design Colleges Accept MAH BDes CET in Maharashtra.

MAH BDesign Latest News and Updates

The State CET cell of Maharashtra is expected to release the MAH BDes notification 2025 in January. The state common entrance test cell conducts the BDes exam to provide admissions to the 4-year full-time bachelor of design courses in the colleges of Maharashtra. For the latest updates, the candidates need to visit the official website frequently. MAH BDes entrance examination is expected from January 2025 onwards.

Candidates who will complete the registration process before the last date will be eligible to download the admit card. MAH BDesign CET admit card 2025 will be issued tentatively a week before the entrance exam. 

CET Cell Maharashtra will declare the result of MAH BDesign CET 2025 in online mode. Students will have to visit cetcell.mahacet.org and login using the application number and password. Exam qualified candidates will be eligible to participate in the counselling and seat allotment process. 

About MAH BDes CET

The Maharashtra state CET cell conducts the MAH BDes entrance exam once a year. The MAH BDesign CET exam is a State-level design entrance exam conducted to provide admission to aspiring candidates. The MAH BDes entrance exam is divided into two parts, i.e, Part A and Part B. As per the year 2024, the duration of the MAH BDes examination is a total of 3 hours (1 hour 30 minutes for part - A and 1 hour 30 minutes for part - B).

exam_name: NIFT PG - National Institute of Fashion Technology Entrance Examination PG

about_exam.heading: About
about_exam.description:
The National Testing Agency is expected to conduct the NIFT PG entrance exam 2025 in February. NTA is yet to announce the schedule of NIFT PG 2025 entrance exam. NIFT offers admission into the postgraduate programmes for the eligible candidates. The authorities will release the NIFT PG notification 2025 online in November at nift.ac.in.

The National Institute of Fashion Technology offers PG courses as M.Design, M.F.M and M.F.Tech. Candidates willing to obtain admission to the PG programmes at National Institute of Fashion technology need to appear for the NIFT PG entrance exam 2025. The applicants have to fill and submit the NIFT PG application form 2025 before the deadline. 

Before applying, the candidates should check the NIFT PG eligibility criteria 2025. To apply for these postgraduate programmes, the aspirants need to have a bachelor's degree from a recognised university in the relevant field. During the NIFT PG 2025 application process, the applicants are required to make online payment of application fee. 

Latest News and Updates of NIFT PG Exam 2025 

NTA will release the NIFT PG notification 2025 on its official website - exams.nta.ac.in/NIFT. The NIFT PG application form 2025 will be released in November, 2024, tentatively. Candidates have to check the NIFT PG 2025 application form last date and submit before the deadline. NTA will conduct the NIFT PG entrance exam in February 2025.

The authorities will release the NIFT PG admit card schedule online. Candidates will be to download the NIFT PG 2025 admit card using the allotted login credentials. The aspirants need to carry the NIFT PG admit card 2025 along with a photo identity proof to the exam centre.

NIFT PG results will be declared by the authorities at the official website. The candidates appearing for M.Des need to appear for the Situation test after CAT and GAT tests. The students appearing for M.F.Tech and M.F.M need to appear for the personal interview round after the GAT test result declaration.

The authorities will declare the NIFT2025 final result in May tentatively for all the NIFT PG courses. The shortlisted candidates need to participate in the NIFT counselling 2025 and seat allotment process. The candidates will be notified about the NIFT 2025 counselling registration details according to the schedule. The NIFT 2025 seat allotment results will be released for each round as per the seat availability.

About NIFT PG Entrance Exam

National Testing Agency (NTA) conducts entrance exams for the applicants to provide admission into NIFT PG courses. NIFT offers various PG design programmes such as Masters of Design (MDes), Masters of Fashion Management (MFM) and Masters of Fashion Technology (MFTech) for a 2 year duration. The National Testing Agency (NTA) conducts NIFT entrance exam 2025 in a pen and paper mode. The shortlisted candidates will be offered admission into their campuses all over India, based on their scores in the NIFT PG entrance examination.

highlights.value: National Institute of Fashion Technology Entrance Examination PG

For MDes & MFM Programmes:

  • Age Limit: There is no age limit to apply for MDes and MFM programmes.

  • Academic Qualification: Candidates who completed their undergraduate degree in any discipline from any recognized  Institute/University. Also, the students who passed their undergraduate 3 years diploma from NIFT/NID.

For MFTech programme: 

  • Age Limit: There is no age limit to apply for the MFTech programme.

  • Academic Qualification: Candidates who completed their BFTech. from National Institute of Fashion Technology (NIFT)

(or)

NOTE: The applicants appearing for the qualifying examination are also eligible to apply.

Aspirants need to keep an eye on the official website for the release of NIFT PG application dates 2025.

How to apply for NIFT PG exam 2025?

The aspirants willing to seek admission to the PG courses are required to meet the eligibility criteria and apply for the NIFT PG 2025 exam. Here are the steps to fill the NIFT PG 2025 application form.

Candidates need to enter their login credentials to download the NIFT PG 2025 admit card.  NIFT PG admit card contains details such as the candidate’s name,  date of birth, application number, category, exam centre code, name and address, course name, reporting time and candidate’s signature.

Candidates have to take a printout of the NIFT PG exam admit card 2025 and carry it to the exam centre on the examination day. Also,  along with the NIFT PG 2025 admit card the candidates have to carry a valid photo identity proof to the examination centre on the day of exam.

cutoffs.html_content:
The NIFT PG 2025 exam cutoff will be released at the official website - nift.ac.in by the authorities. The NIFT PG cutoff 2025 is the minimum score required for candidates to qualify to obtain admission into the NIFT PG programmes. The NIFT PG 2025 exam cutoff will be based on different factors such as the difficulty levels of the exam, total number of applications, the number of candidates appeared for the exam, and the number of available seats.  The NIFT PG cutoff 2025 varies every year. 

The authorities will release the NIFT PG exam 2025 cutoff in the form of opening and closing ranks for each category, that includes Open, OBC-NC, SC, ST, PwD, EWS, NRI, Domicile-Open, Dom-UR, Dom-SC, SC-PwD, and ST-PwD. NIFT PG cutoff indicates the last rank at which the candidate is offered the admission.

counselling_process.html_content:
The NIFT officials will release the NIFT PG exam counselling dates 2025 through the official website - nift.ac.in. The students shortlisted need to register for the NIFT PG 2025 counselling online using the login credentials. The NIFT PG counselling 2025 will be conducted in multiple rounds. During the NIFT PG counselling process, the selected candidates will be allocated seats as per preference in various NIFT campuses based on the ranks.

The steps of NIFT PG exam counselling 2025 include the following.

  • Registration: Candidates have to register online for the NIFT PG counselling process.

  • Choice Filling: During the NIFT PG counselling registration process, the candidates need to select their preferred campuses.

  • Document Verification: The candidates need to upload the required documents as the NIFT authorities will verify them to confirm the seat eligibility.

  • Seat Allotment: NIFT PG seats to the candidates will be allotted based on rank obtained, preference, and the seat availability.

  • Payment of Fees: After NIFT PG seat allotment, the selected candidates need to pay the admission fee within the specified time limit to confirm their seat allotment.
